thread.title: a Satisfied Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by a Satisfied Customer

author: a Satisfied Customer
title: a Satisfied Customer
text:
Steve was helpful in many ways ... ... from understanding which tires I needed ... to offering choices ... and explaining "detail" CLEARLY.
The work was completed in a reasonable amount of time and in slightly less time than anticipated.
Others at the Woburn facility were helpful also.
It was a good experience
